verses.name: Mark 3:12
verses.text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known.

verses.name: Mark 3:13
verses.text: And he goeth up into a mountain, and calleth unto him whom he would: and they came unto him.

verses.name: Mark 3:14
verses.text: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,

verses.name: Mark 3:15
verses.text: And to have power to heal sicknesses, and to cast out devils:

verses.name: Mark 3:17
verses.text: And James the son of Zebedee, and John the brother of James; and he surnamed them Boanerges, which is, The sons of thunder:
